hero.headline: Find Lasting Freedom From Porn—Together
hero.tagline: Join thousands who discovered that real change happens in community. Our group-based program provides the daily support and accountability you've been missing.
hero.socialProof: Trusted by 50,000+ people on their path to freedom

features.sectionHeadline: Everything You Need to Finally Break Free
features.sectionSubheadline: Relay combines daily encouragement, real accountability, and genuine community—the three pillars that make lasting change possible.

items.title: Group-Based Support
items.description: You're placed with others on similar journeys who truly understand what you're facing. No more fighting alone in silence. Your group becomes your team—people who celebrate your wins and lift you up when you struggle.

items.title: Daily Encouragement
items.description: Wake up to motivation that meets you where you are. Regular check-ins and content keep you engaged and moving forward, even on the hard days. Consistency builds momentum—and momentum creates lasting change.

items.title: Real Accountability
items.description: This isn't surface-level support. Accountability partnerships within your group create the external commitment that solo attempts lack. When someone is counting on you, you show up differently.

items.title: Supportive Community
items.description: Connect with thousands who share your goals. The shame loses its power when you realize you're not alone. Here, you'll find understanding instead of judgment—and that makes all the difference.

items.title: Weekly Insights Newsletter
items.description: Practical tips and inspiration delivered to your inbox every week. Continue learning and growing with content designed to strengthen your journey between sessions.

items.title: Therapist-Endorsed
items.description: Mental health professionals across the country refer their clients to Relay. Our program integrates with professional support, giving you a comprehensive path to healing.

benefits.sectionHeadline: What Changes When You're No Longer Alone

items.title: The Isolation Ends
items.description: Stop carrying this in secret. Join a group of real people who understand your struggle without judgment—and watch the shame begin to dissolve.

items.title: Daily Momentum Builds
items.description: No more starting over every Monday. Consistent encouragement and check-ins help you build streaks that turn into lasting habits.

items.title: Accountability That Actually Works
items.description: When you know others are counting on you—and you on them—you find strength you didn't know you had.

items.title: Real, Lasting Freedom
items.description: This isn't about white-knuckling through another week. It's about fundamental change that transforms how you live.

howItWorks.sectionHeadline: Your Path to Freedom Starts Here
howItWorks.sectionSubheadline: Getting started is simple. Within minutes, you'll be connected with people who understand—and a proven structure that works.

steps.title: Begin Your Journey
steps.description: Sign up and tell us about where you are. We'll match you with a group of others at similar stages in their healing journey.

steps.title: Meet Your Group
steps.description: Connect with real people who get it. Your group becomes your team—a small community committed to supporting each other daily.

steps.title: Build Daily Habits
steps.description: Engage with daily encouragement, check-ins, and accountability. Small consistent actions compound into lasting transformation.

steps.title: Experience Lasting Change
steps.description: Watch as freedom becomes your new normal. With the right support, change isn't just possible—it's happening.

testimonials.sectionSubheadline: Thousands have discovered that lasting change is possible. Here's what the journey looks like.

items.quote: I tried to quit on my own for 15 years. Fifteen years of shame and failed promises to myself. Three months with Relay, and I finally understand what freedom feels like. The difference? I stopped trying to do it alone.
items.author: Michael T.
items.title: 8 months free

items.quote: The daily check-ins changed everything. Knowing my group was there, knowing I wasn't invisible in my struggle—it gave me the accountability I could never create by myself. This actually works.
items.author: James R.
items.title: 1 year free

items.quote: I was terrified to join a group. Now I can't imagine recovery without one. These guys understand in a way no one else in my life could. For the first time, I don't feel broken—I feel supported.
items.author: David K.
items.title: 6 months free

items.quote: My therapist recommended Relay as part of my treatment plan. The combination of professional support and daily community accountability has been transformative. I finally have hope again.
items.author: Chris M.
items.title: 10 months free

pricing.sectionSubheadline: Choose the path that's right for your journey. Every plan includes full access to community support.

tiers.name: Starter
tiers.description: For those ready to take the first step

cta.headline: You Were Never Meant to Fight This Alone
cta.subheadline: Change is possible. Thousands have found lasting freedom through the support of people who truly understand. Your healing journey can start today.
cta.guarantee: 7-day free trial. No commitment required. Cancel anytime.

footer.tagline: Change is possible. We're ready to help.
footer.description: Relay is the #1 group-based program helping people find lasting freedom from compulsive sexual behavior through daily support, real accountability, and genuine community.
